Mysterious Butler:
My master believes that fighting monsters for the good of the world is important, but he's also interested in how each of the warriors do against each other. That's why I'm also looking for talented warriors for my master.
Lionel asked my master for help to look for warriors who will go on to become leaders, and my master has agreed to help.
I thought a test through the Ceremony of Chaos would be perfect, but my master said that wasn't enough, and to come up with a better method after discussing it with the Olympiad Manager.
